Spain: War of the Spanish Succession: The war began.
Slovenia: The Philharmonic Society (Academia philharmonicorum) is established in Ljubljana.
Philippine: Domingo Zabálburu de Echevarri appointed Governor-General (1701–1709).
Germany: Frederick I of Prussia crowned himself king; the Duchy of Prussia became the Kingdom of Prussia.
France: Battle of Carpi: In what was the first battle of the War of the Spanish succession, Austrian invaders encountered the French army at Carpi, and defeated them.
England: The Act of Settlement 1701, which required the English monarch to be Protestant, was passed.
Canada: The Great Peace of Montreal, between New France and 40 First Nations, is finalized.
